QuestData.Title: The Ring of Blood: Skra'gath
QuestData.Description: You're murderin' 'em out there, kid! They got a ringer for the next match. They say he's a void lord or something... No way do they want you up against their champion. Did you here that palooka, Mogor, yapping at you? The bets are through the roof!$B$BGet in that ring and take this one out fast!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Skra'gath. Should you win, speak with Wodin the Troll-Servant to collect your reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at the Laughing Skull Ruins in Nagrand.
QuestData.CompletionText: The fight's over when you or your opponent are dead on the floor.
QuestData.RewardText: KID! KID THIS IS IT! The next fight is the big one! The championship!$B$BOk, keep it cool. We don't want the ogres to know that we got anything going on. I get a cut of all this, after all.
